name: glia-v1-monorepo
description: GLIA V1 - Generative Language Integration Assistant

scripts.start: npm run build && cd apps/electron-app && npm start
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/prompt-core && npm install && cd ../browser-manager && npm install && cd ../browser-agent && npm install && cd ../../apps/electron-app && npm install
